title: Demanding Higher Wages, Refinery Workers Strike Shell Oil
teaser: United Steelworkers members are on strike at refineries and chemical plants that process 10 percent of the nation's gasoline, diesel, heating oil and jet fuel. It's the first time since 1980 that refineries have been struck. These days, plants are so automated that they can operate for a good while without workers. But will the strike drag on long enough to shut refineries and boost gas prices?
